actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to make deductions from the proceed of milk marketed commercially by producers in the United States.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit the Secretary of Agriculture's 50-cent milk assessment authority to the States, Puerto Rico, and the District of Columbia (thus prohibiting such authority in other territories and possessions of the United States).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to make deductions from the proceed of milk marketed commercially by producers in the United States.
